query:
SELECT
            created_by,
            coalesce(logs, '') As logs,
            coalesce(log_offset, 0) AS log_offset,
            log_file_index
        FROM v2_job j
            LEFT JOIN job_logs ON job_logs.job_id = j.id
        WHERE id = $1 AND j.workspace_id = $2 AND ($3::TEXT[] IS NULL OR tag = ANY($3))
